amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to fund Fairmont State University.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used to fund Fairmont State University.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A036) Failed by recorded vote: 70 - 350 (Roll no. 337).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A036) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
